Text: Worldwide, 390 billion tons of glacial ice melts annually, contributing about a third to the rise in global sea levels, according to a scientific paper in the journal Nature this year.
Cause: Worldwide, 390 billion tons of glacial ice melts annually
Effect: contributing about a third to the rise in global sea levels, according to a scientific paper in the journal Nature this year.
